cast.name: 坎贝尔·斯科特 Campbell Scott
杰森·丹尼尔·汤普森 Jason Daniel Thompson
约胡鲁·威廉斯 Yohuru Williams

this_title: The Food That Built America Season 3
trans_title: 造就美国的食物 第三季
introduction: Season three of the popular nonfiction series "The Food That Built America" will satisfy viewers' appetites by sharing the origin stories of a new group of bold pioneers behind America's most iconic food empires such as Orville Redenbacher, Ettore "Chef" Boiardi, Wally Amos, Debbi Fields, and Tom Carvel among others. Before these brands became household names, they came from brilliant – sometimes ruthless – visionaries who revolutionized food and changed the culinary landscape of America forever. Through dramatic recreations, fascinating facts, and expert commentary, this season delves into the unbelievable stories of grit, creativity, and determination by these culinary entrepreneurs whose unrelenting innovation helped them come out on top.
chinese_title: 造就美国的食物 第三季
foreign_title: The Food That Built America Season 3
